name: Come on, SWeEt DEaTh
description: First meeting, I have been waiting for you here. Do you remember your own name? ..... I think so, you don't remember anything. Because here, memory is an outcast, a useless, meaningless bubble. So, now, is it time to start your journey? However, what I can tell you, the front, behind the gate, is the only way to well-being. You are here with a great honor. If you want, open the door and see your new and last journey, I believe you will be happy.
